positions.title: Investments and Capital Development
positions.description_html:
VC Connect and Due Diligence
Feel free to reach out at gunjan.verma@ipventures.in

experience.title: Investment Associate
experience.description: •	Closed 10+ deals in Data Analytics, D2C, Energy-Tech, Drone-Tech, EV and Fitness Tech. The aggregate amount raised amounted to more than INR 2 Cr. Negotiated deals with founders as well as investors.•	Collaborated with 50+ institutions for deal-flow. Notable names include Shell E4, Rainmatter Technologies, IPV, Dexter, Bharat Founders Fund, IIM Calcutta, IIM Lucknow, IIT Delhi, IIT Bombay and many more.•	Sourced startups such as Inside FPV, GameEon, Growfitter, Chefkart, Oorjaa, Nova Nova etc., with a conversion rate of more than 60%.•	Prepared Pitch Decks, Financial & Valuation Models, Financial & Business Due Diligence Reports of startups.•	Screened startups and presented to IC team. Prepared Newsletters, Funding Roundups for Soonicorn Ventures and Nucleus Advisors. Led Email Marketing. Delegated work to team members as per their competencies. •	Attended networking events as a representative of Soonicorn. Streamlined Nucleus Startup Genie (an arm of Nucleus Advisors) website from scratch. Other responsibilities include data crunching and generating leads for Soonicorn as well as Nucleus. Managed Investor Relations part of Soonicorn. •	Used Canva, Power Point, Excel, Google Sheets, Tracxn, Brevo, Wordpress, Tally ERP, Word and other data tools extensively.
experience.description_html: • Closed 10+ deals in Data Analytics, D2C, Energy-Tech, Drone-Tech, EV and Fitness Tech. The aggregate amount raised amounted to more than INR 2 Cr. Negotiated deals with founders as well as investors.• Collaborated with 50+ institutions for deal-flow. Notable names include Shell E4, Rainmatter Technologies, IPV, Dexter, Bharat Founders Fund, IIM Calcutta, IIM Lucknow, IIT Delhi, IIT Bombay and many more.• Sourced startups such as Inside FPV, GameEon, Growfitter, Chefkart, Oorjaa, Nova Nova etc., with a conversion rate of more than 60%.• Prepared Pitch Decks, Financial & Valuation Models, Financial & Business Due Diligence Reports of startups.• Screened startups and presented to IC team. Prepared Newsletters, Funding Roundups for Soonicorn Ventures and Nucleus Advisors. Led Email Marketing. Delegated work to team members as per their competencies. • Attended networking events as a representative of Soonicorn. Streamlined Nucleus Startup Genie (an arm of Nucleus Advisors) website from scratch. Other responsibilities include data crunching and generating leads for Soonicorn as well as Nucleus. Managed Investor Relations part of Soonicorn. • Used Canva, Power Point, Excel, Google Sheets, Tracxn, Brevo, Wordpress, Tally ERP, Word and other data tools extensively.

experience.title: Articled Assistant
experience.description: Enhanced my knowledge in different areas like:-* Direct Tax :- Filing income tax returns, TDS returns of Individuals, LLPs and Companies.* Indirect Tax :- Filing GSTR 1 and GSTR 3B of different clients and GST Reconciliation.Once gave tax saving consultation to client.* Assisted in Statutory Audit of an INR 600 cr  Rice manufacturing Company which has 5 branches across India which included it's vouching and Statutory compliances with PF, ESI and GST Reconciliation.*Accounting and preparation of Financial Statements of Companies as per Companies Act 2013 and relevant accounting standards.* Assisted in Tax Audit of an Individual.
